author: Douglas Belkin
title: Paul Ryan Returns to a State Still Recovering From Recession
text:
When Paul Ryan retires as U.S. House speaker and returns to Wisconsin after 20 years in Washington, he will find a state with shifting political and economic sands.
The state went for Donald Trump in the 2016 presidential election, but Democratic wins in state Senate and state Supreme Court elections this year have the party optimistic it can ride anti-Trump sentiment to gains in the state this November and in two years. Even Mr. Ryan’s own seat could be up for grabs now that he won’t be defending it in the fall.
...
